name: GirlDuality
description:
You play as 2 girls in a small town and your mission is to kill everybody and distract them by watering the trees.

To kill somebody, you need to click on a tree using blue girld (to switch between girls, use 2 buttons at the bottom) and then after finding a trap/weapon to kill somebody, press on them to kill.

If the timer is up or you get caught - you lose

also there's 3 bars:

1 - time for how long people are distracted

2 - time until next tree watering

3 - time until next kill

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by:

Babosik - models for objects, idea for the game, help with beta test.

Dsinkerii - code, music and fixing bugs i guess :)
